img_summary: The image shows a close-up of a hand holding a green, glowing object that appears to be wrapped in string or cords. The hand has long, dark fingernails and is wearing a dark, possibly leather glove. The background is dark, and the person is wearing a red garment with gold detailing. The green object has an irregular shape and seems to emit a soft glow.
